::Windrazor walks in::
Windrazor: Thank you. I am here to join your group, and to avenge Soundwave.  
He was a good friend.  And no I'm not suggesting to go into the Alliance base 
alone; I have troops in orbit waiting for my signal.  Do you accept my bid?
